Cheap Hotels near Gare de Lyon, Paris

The Gare de Lyon is the third-largest rail terminal in Paris in terms of passenger and traffic volume. Metro, RER, TGV and other regional and national routes are all available at this beautiful station located in the upbeat 12th district of Paris where, by the way, you can choose from a range of cheap hotels, apartments and other types of budget accommodation. The Gare de Lyon is visible in the distance thanks to the huge clock tower, which tells passengers the time from the four cardinal points. If you want to stay close to one of the main transport hubs in Paris, check out our range of cheap hotels and apartments close to Gare de Lyon.
